arraySorter

Class ArraySortTest<T extends java.lang.Comparable<? super T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • arraySorter.ArraySortTest<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BubbleSortTest

    abstract class ArraySortTest<T extends java.lang.Comparable<? super T>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a basic package of tests for array sorters. These tests generate random arrays, sort them, and then test the sorted arrays' properties.
    • Is the array sorted?
    • Does the array still contain the same values it started with?
    Version:
    October 2019
    Author:
    Hugh Osborne
